content: this month s free pattern is the springtime baby cardi that is quick to knit out of 1 skein of berroco weekend an easy care cotton and acrylic blend perfect for baby items it seems that so many people i know are having babies and most of them are due for springtime pick out a cute pastel color and some matching springtime buttons and you ll have the perfect quick knit for upcoming baby showers this sweater is unisex with an option in the pattern for placing the buttonholes on the opposite side for a boy s cardigan just pick out some cute boy-ish buttons to go with
